title: PowerSellerUSA Two-Tone Tier Pair Panels and Valance Kitchen Curtains Set for Kitchen Windows, Living Room, Dining Room and Basement, Diamond Design with Tuck Buttoned Valance, 58" W x 36" L, Gray
features: ✅ STYLISH AND FUNCTIONAL: When we think of the time we spend in the kitchen, we definitely want it to be a space we enjoy. If you want your kitchen to feel homey and stylish, our two-tone tier pair panels and valance curtain set is just right for you.

✅ PREMIUM QUALITY: Direct, harsh sunlight can fade most materials in your kitchen. Use our semi-sheer tier panels & valance curtain set to protect your entire kitchen from too much sun. Crafted from 100% polyester, our curtains are durable, sturdy, and soft to touch.

✅ Easy Care: Our Valances For Kitchen Are Easy To Care For And Resist Wrinkling, Shrinking, And Stretching. Machine Washable In Warm Water And Gentle Cycle. These Are Low Maintenance, So They Are Perfect For Curtain First-Timers!

✅ AFFORDABLE: These kitchen curtains and valances set are invariably on-trend, giving you the look you want without a painful blow to your wallet. The accommodating rods is 1.5" in diameter and includes two tier panels.

✅ BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Should you have any problems with our product. If for any reason in the first 30 days you are not satisfied with the quality of the item, you can return it with no question asked!
description: One of the best ways to maintain your family's privacy and conserve energy at the same time is to purchase our PowerSellerUSA Two-Tone Tier and Valance Kitchen Curtains Set. Besides the obvious aesthetic appeal of our kitchen curtains valances, it is also more energy efficient. They keep harmful ultraviolet rays out, block a little more noise than some other shades, and help darken a room. This is perfect in your living room, kitchen, bathroom, dining and basement. Our valances for kitchen are timeless and affordable option to cover windows. These 3-piece kitchen curtains & valance can quickly set the mood in a room and turn the window space into a framed work of art. They work seamlessly in any interior and layer beautifully with curtains to diffuse the light, cutting glare and allowing you to see through them while still offering privacy.  Our valances for windows at PowerSellerUSA showcases exceptional craftsmanship, and with its classic style, it's a natural complement to other decor. If you are looking to add a bit of new style and energy into your kitchen, you have come to the right place! Choose the right window treatment for your home. This is a great choice if you are searching for some quick ways to freshen up your kitchen without making too many changes.
